chat.title: troponin
chat.message:
- way too many troponin options, we should only show the one we have
- what does T:N180 mean? if that is the delta between repeats it should change to 2 hours (120min) or be editable
- why 2 d-dimer options?

chat.title: Response to mwahab
chat.message:
Multiple troponins are included because sites have different instrumentals available to use. What will actually appear for providers, will depend on ordering location (ie ordering in DCDH will only show Troponin X while ordering at FSJ will be Troponin XX)


180 means order will be activated 180minutes from now.

chat.title: Too many trop options
chat.message: Agree with mwahab that trop options are a little overwhelming. I'm wondering if we can stratify (line up different tests along L margin, and then subtab various selections. Helps guide the eyes). Also, would be helpful for our site to separate ECG from other diagnostic investigations (i.e. CT angio, echo, etc) as we don't have those at our site. Would need referral out.

chat.title: Consult
chat.message: Can we put PTN on there and attach the phone number for PTN as part of the prompt. And can we make that Cardiologist too because even if and when we consult internal medicine we are directed to speak with cardiologist directly via PTN.
